name: Bitbank
introduce: Bitbank is a crypto currency exchange in Japan* serving more than 550,000 users and 30 available trading pairs. Clients of bitbank can trade cryptocurrencies in spot markets on exchange and on OTC basis. bitbank has also announced a partnership with one of the largest specialized trust bank groups in Japan, Mitsui Sumitomo Trust Holdings, Inc. to establish a certified digital asset custodian company in Japan.
